channel.title: Looking for a Development Team!
channel.description:
Hello, you may have seen my last Dev Team advert but due to my partner being way too inactive I have decided to quit that. Today I am looking to make a new Development Team with the following requirements:
Experienced with the position they're looking for. MUST MUST MUST BE ACTIVE! Must have Skype, mic not needed!
If you are looking to join, please fill in this form below.
Age: Skype: Why do you think you should be on the team?: What position are you going for? Have you any experience in what position you're going for, if so how long and proof?: How long will you be on a day?: What can you bring to the team?
We currently are looking for all positions.

item.title: Looking for a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @Marieloup Marieloup
item.description:
@Marieloup wrote:

Age: 18
Skype: Marieloup.Wolfe
Why do you think you should be on the team?: Becau
What position are you going for? Forum Administrator/Community Manager
Have you any experience in what position you’re going for, if so how long and proof?: I created this Server ElysianX.com [closed] and this server DestinyX.org
How long will you be on a day?: 4, 5 hours (almost always joignable on Skype)
What can you bring to the team? Forums and a kind community.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @BrandonHarkness BrandonHarkness
item.description:
@BrandonHarkness wrote:

I am already the Source developer, sorry if I didn’t say that yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

They have to be able to trust each other. I couldn’t trust you cause you haven’t provided proof you can work with certain type of structures. You haven’t proven anything as a matter of fact. You have only told us that you are looking for “different positions” this doesn’t tell us what YOU can provide to the team itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @BrandonHarkness BrandonHarkness
item.description:
@BrandonHarkness wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:524545”][quote author=BrandonHarkness link=topic=643096.msg4329790#msg4329790 date=1373484191]
Not my fault if you don’t believe me
[/quote]Having belief is the first step in a successful server development team. Without there is no point in a team as then you can’t trust each other to help implement the systems when/as needed.

Example: You could have two people who design content, another person who works solely on improving stability/core/networking.

If they don’t work together/do not believe they can do the standard of work needed to keep A+ quality then the team is voided.[/quote]

Exactly so why are you saying no-one good will join if I have no proof of not wanting to be a wannabe leech fag? I have trust in the people who join but by what you are saying is they have no trust in me.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“BrandonHarkness, post:5, topic:524545”]Not my fault if you don’t believe me[/quote]Having belief is the first step in a successful server development team. Without there is no point in a team as then you can’t trust each other to help implement the systems when/as needed.

Example: You could have two people who design content, another person who works solely on improving stability/core/networking.

If they don’t work together/do not believe they can do the standard of work needed to keep A+ quality then the team is voided.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @BrandonHarkness BrandonHarkness
item.description:
@BrandonHarkness wrote:

Not my fault if you don’t believe me, I don’t believe in releasing code.

item.title: Looking for a Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“BrandonHarkness, post:3, topic:524545”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=643096.msg4329781#msg4329781 date=1373483740]
You don’t have proof of any actual development.

Nobody decent will join this.
[/quote]

What do you mean?[/quote]Let me put this in laymen terms

If you don’t prove you aren’t an imbecile wannabe leech you aren’t going to get any developer who actually knows what the heck they are doing.

Read full topic
